Direct Known Subclasses:
ExecuteOn
public class ExecTask
extends Task

Executes a given command if the os platform is appropriate.

Author:
duncan@x180.com, rubys@us.ibm.com, thomas.haas@softwired-inc.com, Stefan Bodewig, Mariusz Nowostawski
